page.title: 18WILDLIFE
page.content: The{ISLE OF WIGHT}has a wide variety of habitats suitable for amany different species of birds. The ridge of chalk running east_west across the centre of the ISLE OF WIGHT is the dominant feature present.There are numerous copses,thickets and coniferous plantations in the area of {BROOK } This environment is home to a number of regular breeding species which include:_ Dartford warbler,nightjar,stonechat and grasshopper warbler. The species which occasionally nest in the area are:_ Woodlark,wheatear,whinchat,tree pipit and buzzard. The ISLE OF WIGHT is often visited by migrationary birds.
